name: Ultra Cars
description:
The controls:

W, A, S, D - Driving and air controls (yaw and pitch)

Left mouse - Boost (you can fly with it!)

Right mouse - Jump

Right mouse in air - Dodge in the the direction you are steering with wasd or jump up if no direction is pressed (only possible 1s-1.5s after jump)

Shift - Drift and car roll when in air (the drift is a bit weird sometimes)

Space - Toggle camera

N - Toggle map

It was made in a short period of time because I challenged myself to make the mechanics of a game i like to play
